title: Why is only part of a picture displayed after I add it to the home screen gallery widget?
answer:
Touch and hold the widget for 2s or 3s, you'll see an adjustable blue frame. Adjust the frame to display the complete picture. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140254)

 Ensure that there is enough space on the screen for you to adjust the frame. If the screen is totally occupied, remove unwanted icons or move the icons to another screen.
